139{
141 while (!_sessions.empty())
142 {
143 // not remove from queue, prevent loading new sessions
144 delete _sessions.begin()->second;
145 _sessions.erase(_sessions.begin());
146 }

Member Function Documentation

◆ _UpdateGameTime()

void World::_UpdateGameTime ( )
protected

Update the game time.

  • update the time
  • if there is a shutdown timer
  • ... and it is overdue, stop the world (set m_stopEvent)
  • ... else decrease it and if necessary display a shutdown countdown to the users
2666{
2668 Seconds lastGameTime = GameTime::GetGameTime();
2669 GameTime::UpdateGameTimers();
2670
2671 Seconds elapsed = GameTime::GetGameTime() - lastGameTime;
2672
2674 if (!IsStopped() && _shutdownTimer > 0 && elapsed > 0s)
2675 {
2677 if (_shutdownTimer <= elapsed.count())
2678 {
2679 if (!(_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2680 _stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2681 else
2682 _shutdownTimer = 1; // minimum timer value to wait idle state
2683 }
2685 else
2686 {
2687 _shutdownTimer -= elapsed.count();
2688
2689 ShutdownMsg();
2690 }
2691 }
2692}
Seconds
std::chrono::seconds Seconds
Seconds shorthand typedef.
Definition Duration.h:30

void World::_UpdateRealmCharCount ( PreparedQueryResult  resultCharCount,

)
protected
2900{
2901 uint8 charCount{0};
2902 if (resultCharCount)
2903 {
2904 Field* fields = resultCharCount->Fetch();
2905 charCount = uint8(fields[1].Get<uint64>());
2906 }
2907
2908 LoginDatabaseTransaction trans = LoginDatabase.BeginTransaction();
2909
2910 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_REP_REALM_CHARACTERS);
2911 stmt->SetData(0, charCount);
2912 stmt->SetData(1, accountId);
2913 stmt->SetData(2, realm.Id.Realm);
2914 trans->Append(stmt);
2915
2916 LoginDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
2917}

◆ AddSession_()

void World::AddSession_ ( WorldSession *  s)
private
258{
259 ASSERT (s);
260
261 // kick existing session with same account (if any)
262 // if character on old session is being loaded, then return
263 if (!KickSession(s->GetAccountId()))
264 {
265 s->KickPlayer("kick existing session with same account");
266 delete s; // session not added yet in session list, so not listed in queue
267 return;
268 }
269
270 SessionMap::const_iterator old = _sessions.find(s->GetAccountId());
271 if (old != _sessions.end())
272 {
273 WorldSession* oldSession = old->second;
274
275 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(oldSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
276 _disconnects[s->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
277
278 // pussywizard:
279 if (oldSession->HandleSocketClosed())
280 {
281 // there should be no offline session if current one is logged onto a character
282 SessionMap::iterator iter;
283 if ((iter = _offlineSessions.find(oldSession->GetAccountId())) != _offlineSessions.end())
284 {
285 WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
286 _offlineSessions.erase(iter);
287 delete tmp;
288 }
289 oldSession->SetOfflineTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
290 _offlineSessions[oldSession->GetAccountId()] = oldSession;
291 }
292 else
293 {
294 delete oldSession;
295 }
296 }
297
298 _sessions[s->GetAccountId()] = s;
299
300 uint32 Sessions = GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount();
301 uint32 pLimit = GetPlayerAmountLimit();
302
303 // don't count this session when checking player limit
304 --Sessions;
305
306 if (pLimit > 0 && Sessions >= pLimit && AccountMgr::IsPlayerAccount(s->GetSecurity()) && !s->CanSkipQueue() && !HasRecentlyDisconnected(s))
307 {
308 AddQueuedPlayer(s);
309 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
310 return;
311 }
312
313 s->InitializeSession();
314
315 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
316}
uint32
std::uint32_t uint32
Definition Define.h:107

#define ASSERT

◆ DetectDBCLang()

void World::DetectDBCLang ( )
private
2235{
2236 uint8 m_lang_confid = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DBC.Locale", 255);
2237
2238 if (m_lang_confid != 255 && m_lang_confid >= TOTAL_LOCALES)
2239 {
2240 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Incorrect DBC.Locale! Must be >= 0 and < {} (set to 0)", TOTAL_LOCALES);
2241 m_lang_confid = LOCALE_enUS;
2242 }
2243
2244 ChrRacesEntry const* race = sChrRacesStore.LookupEntry(1);
2245 std::string availableLocalsStr;
2246
2247 uint8 default_locale = TOTAL_LOCALES;
2248 for (uint8 i = default_locale - 1; i < TOTAL_LOCALES; --i) // -1 will be 255 due to uint8
2249 {
2250 if (race->name[i][0] != '\0') // check by race names
2251 {
2252 default_locale = i;
2253 _availableDbcLocaleMask |= (1 << i);
2254 availableLocalsStr += localeNames[i];
2255 availableLocalsStr += " ";
2256 }
2257 }
2258
2259 if (default_locale != m_lang_confid && m_lang_confid < TOTAL_LOCALES &&
2260 (_availableDbcLocaleMask & (1 << m_lang_confid)))
2261 {
2262 default_locale = m_lang_confid;
2263 }
2264
2265 if (default_locale >= TOTAL_LOCALES)
2266 {
2267 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Unable to determine your DBC Locale! (corrupt DBC?)");
2268 exit(1);
2269 }
2270
2271 _defaultDbcLocale = LocaleConstant(default_locale);
2272
2273 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using {} DBC Locale As Default. All Available DBC locales: {}", localeNames[GetDefaultDbcLocale()], availableLocalsStr.empty() ? "<none>" : availableLocalsStr);
2274 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2275}

◆ FindPlayerInZone()

Player * World::FindPlayerInZone ( uint32  zone)
overridevirtual

Find a player in a specified zone.

  • circle through active sessions and return the first player found in the zone

Implements IWorld.

172{
174 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
175 for (itr = _sessions.begin(); itr != _sessions.end(); ++itr)
176 {
177 if (!itr->second)
178 continue;
179
180 Player* player = itr->second->GetPlayer();
181 if (!player)
182 continue;

186 }

◆ HasRecentlyDisconnected()

bool World::HasRecentlyDisconnected ( WorldSession *  session)
overridevirtual

Implements IWorld.

319{
320 if (!session)
321 return false;
322
323 if (uint32 tolerance = getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
324 {
325 for (DisconnectMap::iterator i = _disconnects.begin(); i != _disconnects.end();)
326 {
327 if ((GameTime::GetGameTime().count() - i->second) < tolerance)
328 {
329 if (i->first == session->GetAccountId())
330 return true;
331 ++i;
332 }
333 else
334 _disconnects.erase(i++);
335 }
336 }
337 return false;
338}

References _disconnects, CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE, WorldSession::GetAccountId(), GameTime::GetGameTime(), and getIntConfig().

2643{
2644 _queuedPlayer.clear(); // prevent send queue update packet and login queued sessions
2645
2646 // session not removed at kick and will removed in next update tick
2647 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _sessions.begin(); itr != _sessions.end(); ++itr)
2648 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAll sessions");
2649
2650 // pussywizard: kick offline sessions
2651 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _offlineSessions.begin(); itr != _offlineSessions.end(); ++itr)
2652 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAll offline sessions");
2653}

References _offlineSessions, _queuedPlayer, and _sessions.

◆ KickAllLess()

void World::KickAllLess ( AccountTypes  sec)
overridevirtual

Kick (and save) all players with security level less sec

Implements IWorld.

2657{
2658 // session not removed at kick and will removed in next update tick
2659 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _sessions.begin(); itr != _sessions.end(); ++itr)
2660 if (itr->second->GetSecurity() < sec)
2661 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAllLess");
2662}

References _sessions.

Referenced by SetPlayerSecurityLimit().

◆ KickSession()

bool World::KickSession ( uint32  id)
overridevirtual

Remove a given session.

  • Find the session, kick the user, but we can't delete session at this moment to prevent iterator invalidation

Implements IWorld.

237{
239 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = _sessions.find(id);
240
241 if (itr != _sessions.end() && itr->second)
242 {
243 if (itr->second->PlayerLoading())
244 return false;
245
246 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickSession", false);
247 }
248
249 return true;
250}

References _sessions.

Referenced by AddSession_().

◆ LoadConfigSettings()

void World::LoadConfigSettings ( bool  reload = false)
overridevirtual

Initialize config values.

  • Read the player limit and the Message of the day from the config file
  • Read ticket system setting from the config file
  • Get string for new logins (newly created characters)
  • Send server info on login?
  • Read all rates from the config file
  • Read other configuration items from the config file
Todo:
Add MonsterSight in worldserver.conf or put it as define
  • Load the CharDelete related config options
  • Load the ItemDelete related config options
  • Read the "Data" directory from the config file

Implements IWorld.

410{
411 if (reload)
412 {
413 if (!sConfigMgr->Reload())
414 {
415 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "World settings reload fail: can't read settings.");
416 return;
417 }
418
419 sLog->LoadFromConfig();
420 sMetric->LoadFromConfigs();
421 }
422
423 // Set realm id and enable db logging
424 sLog->SetRealmId(realm.Id.Realm);
425
426 sScriptMgr->OnBeforeConfigLoad(reload);
427
428 // load update time related configs
429 sWorldUpdateTime.LoadFromConfig();

433 {

435 }

664 _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PlayerSave.Stats.MinLevel", 0);
665 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] > MAX_LEVEL || int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE]) < 0)
666 {
667 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "PlayerSave.Stats.MinLevel ({}) must be in range 0..80. Using default, do not save character stats (0).", _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE]);
668 _int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] = 0;
669 }
670
671 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MapUpdateInterval", 10);
672 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] < MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY)
673 {
674 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "MapUpdateInterval ({}) must be greater {}. Use this minimal value.", _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE], MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY);
675 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] = MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY;
676 }
677 if (reload)
678 sMapMgr->SetMapUpdateInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE]);
679
680 _int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_CHANGEWEATHER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ChangeWeatherInterval", 10 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
681
682 if (reload)
683 {
684 uint32 val = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("WorldServerPort", 8085);
685 if (val != _int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD])
686 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "WorldServerPort option can't be changed at worldserver.conf reload, using current value ({}).", _int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD]);
687 }
688 else
689 _int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("WorldServerPort", 8085);
690

693 _int_configs[CONFIG_SOCKET_TIMEOUTTIME_ACTIVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("SocketTimeOutTimeActive", 60000);
694 _int_configs[CONFIG_SESSION_ADD_DELAY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("SessionAddDelay", 10000);

951
952 _int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("UpdateUptimeInterval", 10);
953 if (int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]) <= 0)
954 {
955 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "UpdateUptimeInterval ({}) must be > 0, set to default 10.", _int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]);
956 _int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE] = 1;
957 }
958
959 if (reload)
960 {
961 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
962 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
963 }
964
965 // log db cleanup interval
966 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LogDB.Opt.ClearInterval", 10);
967 if (int32(_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]) <= 0)
968 {
969 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LogDB.Opt.ClearInterval ({}) must be > 0, set to default 10.", _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]);
970 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] = 10;
971 }
972 if (reload)
973 {
974 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
975 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
976 }
977 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LogDB.Opt.ClearTime", 1209600); // 14 days default
978 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Will clear `logs` table of entries older than {} seconds every {} minutes.",
979 _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME], _int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]);
980

1204
1205 if (int32 clientCacheId = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ClientCacheVersion", 0))
1206 {
1207 // overwrite DB/old value
1208 if (clientCacheId > 0)
1209 {
1210 _int_configs[CONFIG_CLIENTCACHE_VERSION] = clientCacheId;
1211 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Client cache version set to: {}", clientCacheId);
1212 }
1213 else
1214 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "ClientCacheVersion can't be negative {}, ignored.", clientCacheId);
1215 }

1219 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Guild.EventLogRecordsCount", GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS);
1220 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS)
1221 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS;
1222 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Guild.BankEventLogRecordsCount", GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS);
1223 if (_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS)
1224 _int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS;
1225
1226 //visibility on continents
1227 _maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.Continents", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1228 if (_maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1229 {
1230 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Continents can't be less max aggro radius {}", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1231 _maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1232 }
1233 else if (_maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1234 {
1235 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Continents can't be greater {}", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1236 _maxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1237 }
1238
1239 //visibility in instances
1240 _maxVisibleDistanceInInstances = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.Instances", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE);
1241 if (_maxVisibleDistanceInInstances < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1242 {
1243 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Instances can't be less max aggro radius {}", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1244 _maxVisibleDistanceInInstances = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1245 }
1246 else if (_maxVisibleDistanceInInstances > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1247 {
1248 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Instances can't be greater {}", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1249 _maxVisibleDistanceInInstances = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1250 }
1251
1252 //visibility in BG/Arenas
1253 _maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.BGArenas", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_BGARENAS);
1254 if (_maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1255 {
1256 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.BGArenas can't be less max aggro radius {}", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1257 _maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1258 }
1259 else if (_maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1260 {
1261 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.BGArenas can't be greater {}", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1262 _maxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1263 }
1264

1267 _int_configs[CONFIG_CHARDELETE_MIN_LEVEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("CharDelete.MinLevel", 0);
1268 _int_configs[CONFIG_CHARDELETE_KEEP_DAYS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("CharDelete.KeepDays", 30);

1290
1291 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOWS_RANK_MOD_FOR_PET_HEALTH] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Pet.RankMod.Health", true);
1292
1293 _bool_configs[CONFIG_MUNCHING_BLIZZLIKE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("MunchingBlizzlike.Enabled", true);
1294
1295 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_DAZE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Daze.Enabled", true);
1296
1297 _int_configs[CONFIG_DAILY_RBG_MIN_LEVEL_AP_REWARD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<uint32>("DailyRBGArenaPoints.MinLevel", 71);
1298
1300 std::string dataPath = sConfigMgr->GetOption<std::string>("DataDir", "./");
1301 if (dataPath.empty() || (dataPath.at(dataPath.length() - 1) != '/' && dataPath.at(dataPath.length() - 1) != '\\'))
1302 dataPath.push_back('/');
1303
1304#if AC_PLATFORM == AC_PLATFORM_UNIX || AC_PLATFORM == AC_PLATFORM_APPLE
1305 if (dataPath[0] == '~')
1306 {
1307 const char* home = getenv("HOME");
1308 if (home)
1309 dataPath.replace(0, 1, home);
1310 }
1311#endif
1312
1313 if (reload)
1314 {
1315 if (dataPath != _dataPath)
1316 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DataDir option can't be changed at worldserver.conf reload, using current value ({}).", _dataPath);
1317 }
1318 else
1319 {
1320 _dataPath = dataPath;
1321 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using DataDir {}", _dataPath);
1322 }
1323
1324 bool enableIndoor = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableIndoorCheck", true);
1325 _bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_INDOOR_CHECK] = enableIndoor;
1326 bool enableLOS = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableLOS", true);
1327 bool enableHeight = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableHeight", true);
1328 bool enablePetLOS = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.petLOS", true);
1329 _bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_BLIZZLIKE_PVP_LOS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.BlizzlikePvPLOS", true);
1330 _bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_BLIZZLIKE_LOS_OPEN_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.BlizzlikeLOSInOpenWorld", true);
1331
1332 if (!enableHeight)
1333 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "VMap height checking disabled! Creatures movements and other various things WILL be broken! Expect no support.");
1334
1335 VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->setEnableLineOfSightCalc(enableLOS);
1336 VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->setEnableHeightCalc(enableHeight);
1337 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "WORLD: VMap support included. LineOfSight:{}, getHeight:{}, indoorCheck:{} PetLOS:{}", enableLOS, enableHeight, enableIndoor, enablePetLOS);
1338
1339 _bool_configs[CONFIG_PET_LOS] = enablePetLOS;
1340 _bool_configs[CONFIG_START_CUSTOM_SPELLS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.CustomSpells", false);
1341 _int_configs[CONFIG_HONOR_AFTER_DUEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("HonorPointsAfterDuel", 0);
1342 _bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_EXPLORED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.MapsExplored", false);
1343 _bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_REP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.AllReputation", false);
1344 _bool_configs[CONFIG_ALWAYS_MAXSKILL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AlwaysMaxWeaponSkill", false);
1345 _bool_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_ENABLE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PvPToken.Enable", false);

3104 QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT db_version, cache_id FROM version LIMIT 1");
3105 if (result)
3106 {
3107 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3108
3109 _dbVersion = fields[0].Get<std::string>();
3110
3111 // will be overwrite by config values if different and non-0
3112 _int_configs[CONFIG_CLIENTCACHE_VERSION] = fields[1].Get<uint32>();
3113 }
3114

◆ LoadWorldStates()

void World::LoadWorldStates ( )
overridevirtual

Implements IWorld.

3131{
3132 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3133
3134 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, value FROM worldstates");
3135
3136 if (!result)
3137 {
3138 LOG_WARN("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 world states. DB table `worldstates` is empty!");
3139 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3140 return;
3141 }
3142
3143 do
3144 {
3145 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3146 _worldstates[fields[0].Get<uint32>()] = fields[1].Get<uint32>();
3147 } while (result->NextRow());
3148
3149 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded {} World States in {} ms", _worldstates.size(), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3150 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3151}
CharacterDatabase

Accessor to the character database.

2875{
2876 CliCommandHolder::Print zprint = nullptr;
2877 void* callbackArg = nullptr;
2878 CliCommandHolder* command = nullptr;
2879 while (_cliCmdQueue.next(command))
2880 {
2881 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "CLI command under processing...");
2882 zprint = command->m_print;
2883 callbackArg = command->m_callbackArg;
2884 CliHandler handler(callbackArg, zprint);
2885 handler.ParseCommands(command->m_command);
2886 if (command->m_commandFinished)

2888 delete command;
2889 }
2890}

◆ RemoveQueuedPlayer()

bool World::RemoveQueuedPlayer ( WorldSession *  session)
overridevirtual

Implements IWorld.

361{
362 uint32 sessions = GetActiveSessionCount();
363
364 uint32 position = 1;
365 Queue::iterator iter = _queuedPlayer.begin();
366
367 // search to remove and count skipped positions
368 bool found = false;
369
370 for (; iter != _queuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
371 {
372 if (*iter == sess)
373 {
374 sess->SetInQueue(false);
375 sess->ResetTimeOutTime(false);
376 iter = _queuedPlayer.erase(iter);
377 found = true;
378 break;
379 }
380 }
381
382 // if session not queued then it was an active session
383 if (!found)
384 {
385 ASSERT(sessions > 0);
386 --sessions;
387 }
388
389 // accept first in queue
390 if ((!GetPlayerAmountLimit() || sessions < GetPlayerAmountLimit()) && !_queuedPlayer.empty())
391 {
392 WorldSession* pop_sess = _queuedPlayer.front();
393 pop_sess->InitializeSession();
394 _queuedPlayer.pop_front();
395
396 // update iter to point first queued socket or end() if queue is empty now
397 iter = _queuedPlayer.begin();
398 position = 1;
399 }
400
401 // update queue position from iter to end()
402 for (; iter != _queuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
403 (*iter)->SendAuthWaitQueue(position);
404
405 return found;
406}
World::GetActiveSessionCount
uint32 GetActiveSessionCount() const override
Definition World.h:167

References _queuedPlayer, ASSERT, GetActiveSessionCount(), GetPlayerAmountLimit(), WorldSession::InitializeSession(), WorldSession::ResetTimeOutTime(), and WorldSession::SetInQueue().

Referenced by AddSession_(), and UpdateSessions().

◆ SetInitialWorldSettings()

void World::SetInitialWorldSettings ( )
overridevirtual

Initialize the World.

  • Server startup begin
  • Initialize the random number generator
  • Initialize detour memory management
  • Initialize VMapMgr function pointers (to untangle game/collision circular deps)
  • Initialize config settings
  • Initialize Allowed Security Level
  • Init highest guids before any table loading to prevent using not initialized guids in some code.
  • Check the existence of the map files for all starting areas.
  • Initialize pool manager
  • Initialize game event manager
  • Loading strings. Getting no records means core load has to be canceled because no error message can be output.
  • Update the realm entry in the database with the realm type from the config file
  • Custom Hook for loading DB items
  • Load the DBC files
  • Initilize static helper structures
  • Load dynamic data tables from the database
  • Handle outdated emails (delete/return)
  • Load AutoBroadCast
  • Load Motd
  • Load and initialize scripts
  • Initialize game time and timers
  • Initialize MapMgr
  • Initialize Battlegrounds
  • Initialize outdoor pvp
  • Initialize Battlefield
  • Initialize Warden

Implements IWorld.

1509{
1511 uint32 startupBegin = getMSTime();
1512
1514 srand((unsigned int)GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
1515
1517 dtAllocSetCustom(dtCustomAlloc, dtCustomFree);
1518
1520 VMAP::VMapMgr2* vmmgr2 = VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr();
1521 vmmgr2->GetLiquidFlagsPtr = &GetLiquidFlags;
1522 vmmgr2->IsVMAPDisabledForPtr = &DisableMgr::IsVMAPDisabledFor;
1523
1525 LoadConfigSettings();
1526
1528 LoadDBAllowedSecurityLevel();
1529
1531 sObjectMgr->SetHighestGuids();
1532
1533 if (!sConfigMgr->isDryRun())
1534 {
1536 if (!MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -6240.32f, 331.033f)
1537 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -8949.95f, -132.493f)
1538 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -618.518f, -4251.67f)
1539 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, 1676.35f, 1677.45f)
1540 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, 10311.3f, 832.463f)
1541 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -2917.58f, -257.98f)
1542 || (_int_configs[CONFIG_EXPANSION] && (
1543 !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(530, 10349.6f, -6357.29f) ||
1544 !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(530, -3961.64f, -13931.2f))))
1545 {
1546 exit(1);
1547 }
1548 }
1549
1551 sPoolMgr->Initialize();
1552
1554 sGameEventMgr->Initialize();
1555
1557 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
1558 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Acore Strings...");
1559 if (!sObjectMgr->LoadAcoreStrings())
1560 exit(1); // Error message displayed in function already
1561
1562 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Module Strings...");
1563 sObjectMgr->LoadModuleStrings();
1564 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Module Strings Locale...");
1565 sObjectMgr->LoadModuleStringsLocale();
1566
1568 //No SQL injection as values are treated as integers
1569
1570 // not send custom type REALM_FFA_PVP to realm list
1571 uint32 server_type;
1572 if (IsFFAPvPRealm())
1573 server_type = REALM_TYPE_PVP;
1574 else
1575 server_type = getIntConfig(CONFIG_GAME_TYPE);
1576
1577 uint32 realm_zone = getIntConfig(CONFIG_REALM_ZONE);
1578
1579 LoginDatabase.Execute("UPDATE realmlist SET icon = {}, timezone = {} WHERE id = '{}'", server_type, realm_zone, realm.Id.Realm); // One-time query
1580
1582 sScriptMgr->OnLoadCustomDatabaseTable();
1583
1585 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Initialize Data Stores...");
1586 LoadDBCStores(_dataPath);
1587 DetectDBCLang();
1588
1589 // Load cinematic cameras
1590 LoadM2Cameras(_dataPath);
1591
1592 // Load IP Location Database
1593 sIPLocation->Load();
1594
1595 std::vector<uint32> mapIds;
1596 for (auto const& map : sMapStore)
1597 {
1598 mapIds.emplace_back(map->MapID);
1599 }
1600
1601 vmmgr2->InitializeThreadUnsafe(mapIds);
1602
1603 MMAP::MMapMgr* mmmgr = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapMgr();
1604 mmmgr->InitializeThreadUnsafe(mapIds);
1605
1606 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Game Graveyard...");
1607 sGraveyard->LoadGraveyardFromDB();
1608
1609 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Initializing PlayerDump Tables...");
1610 PlayerDump::InitializeTables();
1611
1613 AIRegistry::Initialize();
1614
1615 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading SpellInfo Store...");
1616 sSpellMgr->LoadSpellInfoStore();

1631 sSpellMgr->LoadSkillLineAbilityMap();

1649 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Instances...");

1658 sObjectMgr->LoadCreatureLocales();

1672 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Localization Strings loaded in {} ms", GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
1673 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");

2021 // pussywizard:
2022 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Deleting Invalid Mail Items...");
2023 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2024 CharacterDatabase.Execute("DELETE mi FROM mail_items mi LEFT JOIN item_instance ii ON mi.item_guid = ii.guid WHERE ii.guid IS NULL");
2025 CharacterDatabase.Execute("DELETE mi FROM mail_items mi LEFT JOIN mail m ON mi.mail_id = m.id WHERE m.id IS NULL");
2026 CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE mail m LEFT JOIN mail_items mi ON m.id = mi.mail_id SET m.has_items=0 WHERE m.has_items<>0 AND mi.mail_id IS NULL");

2079 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_INS_UPTIME);
2080 stmt->SetData(0, realm.Id.Realm);
2081 stmt->SetData(1, uint32(GameTime::GetStartTime().count()));
2082 stmt->SetData(2, GitRevision::GetFullVersion());
2083 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2084
2085 _timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].SetInterval(1 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2086 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2087 //Update "uptime" table based on configuration entry in minutes.
2088
2089 _timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].SetInterval(20 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2090 //erase corpses every 20 minutes
2091 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].SetInterval(_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2092 // clean logs table every 14 days by default
2093 _timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].SetInterval(getIntConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_INTERVAL));
2094
2095 _timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].SetInterval(getIntConfig(CONFIG_DB_PING_INTERVAL)*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS); // Mysql ping time in minutes
2096
2097 // our speed up
2098 _timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].SetInterval(5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2099
2100 _timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].SetInterval(5 * IN_MILLISECONDS); // update who list cache every 5 seconds
2101
2102 _mail_expire_check_timer = GameTime::GetGameTime() + 6h;
2103

2113

2118 Player::DeleteOldRecoveryItems();
2119

2159 LoginDatabase.Execute("DELETE FROM ip_banned WHERE unbandate <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AND unbandate<>bandate"); // One-time query
2160
2161 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate Next Daily Quest Reset Time...");
2162 InitDailyQuestResetTime();
2163

2165 InitWeeklyQuestResetTime();
2166

2168 InitMonthlyQuestResetTime();

2170 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate Random Battleground Reset Time..." );
2171 InitRandomBGResetTime();
2172
2173 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate Deletion Of Old Calendar Events Time...");
2174 InitCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime();
2175
2176 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate Guild Cap Reset Time...");
2177 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2178 InitGuildResetTime();
2179
2180 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Petitions...");
2181 sPetitionMgr->LoadPetitions();
2182
2183 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Petition Signs...");
2184 sPetitionMgr->LoadSignatures();
2185
2186 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Stored Loot Items...");
2187 sLootItemStorage->LoadStorageFromDB();
2188
2189 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Channel Rights...");
2190 ChannelMgr::LoadChannelRights();
2191
2192 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Channels...");
2193 ChannelMgr::LoadChannels();
2194
2195 sScriptMgr->OnBeforeWorldInitialized();
2196
2197 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_PRELOAD_ALL_NON_INSTANCED_MAP_GRIDS))
2198 {
2199 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading All Grids For All Non-Instanced Maps...");
2200
2201 for (uint32 i = 0; i < sMapStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
2202 {
2203 MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(i);
2204
2205 if (mapEntry && !mapEntry->Instanceable())
2206 {
2207 Map* map = sMapMgr->CreateBaseMap(mapEntry->MapID);
2208
2209 if (map)
2210 {
2211 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loading All Grids For Map {}", map->GetId());
2212 map->LoadAllCells();
2213 }
2214 }
2215 }
2216 }
2217
2218 uint32 startupDuration = GetMSTimeDiffToNow(startupBegin);
2219
2220 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2221 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "WORLD: World Initialized In {} Minutes {} Seconds", (startupDuration / 60000), ((startupDuration % 60000) / 1000)); // outError for red color in console
2222 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2223
2224 METRIC_EVENT("events", "World initialized", "World Initialized In " + std::to_string(startupDuration / 60000) + " Minutes " + std::to_string((startupDuration % 60000) / 1000) + " Seconds");
2225
2226 if (sConfigMgr->isDryRun())
2227 {
2228 sMapMgr->UnloadAll();
2229 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "AzerothCore Dry Run Completed, Terminating.");
2230 exit(0);
2231 }
2232}

◆ ShutdownCancel()

void World::ShutdownCancel ( )
overridevirtual

Cancel a planned server shutdown.

Implements IWorld.

2769{
2770 // nothing cancel or too later
2771 if (!_shutdownTimer || _stopEvent)
2772 return;
2773
2774 ServerMessageType msgid = (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_CANCELLED : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED;
2775
2776 _shutdownMask = 0;
2777 _shutdownTimer = 0;
2778 _exitCode = SHUTDOWN_EXIT_CODE; // to default value
2779 SendServerMessage(msgid);
2780
2781 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server {} cancelled.", (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"));
2782
2783 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownCancel();
2784}

◆ ShutdownMsg()

void World::ShutdownMsg ( bool  show = false,
Player *  player = nullptr,
std::string const &  reason = std::string() 
)
overridevirtual

Displays a shutdown message at specific intervals or immediately if required.

Show the time remaining for a server shutdown/restart with a reason appended if one is provided. Messages are displayed at regular intervals such as every 12 hours, 1 hour, 5 minutes, 1 minute, 30 seconds, 10 seconds, and every second in the last 10 seconds.

Parameters
showForces the message to be displayed immediately.
playerThe player who should recieve the message (can be nullptr for global messages).
reasonThe reason for the shutdown, appended to the message if provided.
  • Display a message every 12 hours, hour, 5 minutes, minute, 30 seconds, 10 seconds and finally seconds

Implements IWorld.

2738{
2739 // Do not show a message for idle shutdown
2740 if (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE)
2741 return;
2742
2743 bool twelveHours = (_shutdownTimer > 12 * HOUR && (_shutdownTimer % (12 * HOUR)) == 0); // > 12 h ; every 12 h
2744 bool oneHour = (_shutdownTimer < 12 * HOUR && (_shutdownTimer % HOUR) == 0); // < 12 h ; every 1 h
2745 bool fiveMin = (_shutdownTimer < 30 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % (5 * MINUTE)) == 0); // < 30 min ; every 5 min
2746 bool oneMin = (_shutdownTimer < 15 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % MINUTE) == 0); // < 15 min ; every 1 min
2747 bool thirtySec = (_shutdownTimer < 5 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % 30) == 0); // < 5 min; every 30 sec
2748 bool tenSec = (_shutdownTimer < 1 * MINUTE && (_shutdownTimer % 10) == 0); // < 1 min; every 10 sec
2749 bool oneSec = (_shutdownTimer < 10 * SECOND && (_shutdownTimer % 1) == 0); // < 10 sec; every 1 sec
2750
2752 if (show || twelveHours || oneHour || fiveMin || oneMin || thirtySec || tenSec || oneSec)
2753 {
2754 std::string str = secsToTimeString(_shutdownTimer).append(".");
2755 if (!reason.empty())
2756 str += " - " + reason;
2757 // Display the reason every 12 hours, hour, 5 minutes, minute. At 60 seconds and at 10 seconds
2758 else if (!_shutdownReason.empty() && (twelveHours || oneHour || fiveMin || oneMin || _shutdownTimer == 60 || _shutdownTimer == 10))
2759 str += " - " + _shutdownReason;
2760
2761 ServerMessageType msgid = (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME;
2762 SendServerMessage(msgid, str, player);
2763 LOG_WARN("server.worldserver", "Server {} in {}", (_shutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restarting" : "shutdown"), str);
2764 }
2765}
SECOND
constexpr auto SECOND
Definition Common.h:46
SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME
@ SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME
Definition IWorld.h:56
SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME
@ SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME
Definition IWorld.h:57
secsToTimeString
std::string secsToTimeString(uint64 timeInSecs, bool shortText)
Definition Util.cpp:73
World::_shutdownReason
std::string _shutdownReason
Definition World.h:369

References _shutdownMask, _shutdownReason, _shutdownTimer, HOUR, LOG_WARN, MINUTE, SECOND, secsToTimeString(), SendServerMessage(), SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME, SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME, SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE, and SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART.

Referenced by _UpdateGameTime(), and ShutdownServ().

◆ ShutdownServ()

void World::ShutdownServ ( uint32  time,
uint32  options,
uint8  exitcode,
std::string const &  reason = std::string() 
)
overridevirtual

Shutdown the server.

  • If the shutdown time is 0, set m_stopEvent (except if shutdown is 'idle' with remaining sessions)
  • Else set the shutdown timer and warn users

Implements IWorld.

2696{
2697 // ignore if server shutdown at next tick
2698 if (IsStopped())
2699 return;
2700
2701 _shutdownMask = options;
2702 _exitCode = exitcode;
2703 _shutdownReason = reason;
2704
2705 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server shutdown called with ShutdownMask {}, ExitCode {}, Time {}, Reason {}", ShutdownMask(options), ShutdownExitCode(exitcode), secsToTimeString(time), reason);
2706
2708 if (time == 0)
2709 {
2710 if (!(options & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2711 _stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2712 else
2713 _shutdownTimer = 1; //So that the session count is re-evaluated at next world tick
2714 }
2716 else
2717 {
2718 _shutdownTimer = time;
2719 ShutdownMsg(true, nullptr, reason);
2720 }
2721
2722 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownInitiate(ShutdownExitCode(exitcode), ShutdownMask(options));
2723}
ShutdownExitCode
ShutdownExitCode
Definition World.h:52
ShutdownMask
ShutdownMask
Definition World.h:46

References _exitCode, _shutdownMask, _shutdownReason, _shutdownTimer, _stopEvent, GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount(), IsStopped(), LOG_DEBUG, secsToTimeString(), SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE, ShutdownMsg(), and sScriptMgr.

◆ Update()

void World::Update ( uint32  diff)
overridevirtual

Update the World !

  • Update the game time and check for shutdown time
  • Update the different timers
  • Update Who List Cache

Handle daily quests reset time

Handle weekly quests reset time

Handle monthly quests reset time

Handle weather updates when the timer has passed

Clean logs table

  • Update objects when the timer has passed (maps, transport, creatures, ...)

Update uptime table

  • Erase corpses once every 20 minutes
  • Process Game events when necessary
  • Ping to keep MySQL connections alive

Implements IWorld.

2279{
2280 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time_total");
2281
2283 _UpdateGameTime();
2284 Seconds currentGameTime = GameTime::GetGameTime();
2285
2286 sWorldUpdateTime.UpdateWithDiff(diff);
2287
2288 // Record update if recording set in log and diff is greater then minimum set in log
2289 sWorldUpdateTime.RecordUpdateTime(GameTime::GetGameTimeMS(), diff, GetActiveSessionCount());
2290
2291 DynamicVisibilityMgr::Update(GetActiveSessionCount());
2292
2294 for (int i = 0; i < WUPDATE_COUNT; ++i)
2295 {
2296 if (_timers[i].GetCurrent() >= 0)
2297 _timers[i].Update(diff);
2298 else
2299 _timers[i].SetCurrent(0);
2300 }
2301
2302 // pussywizard: our speed up and functionality
2303 if (_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Passed())
2304 {
2305 _timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Reset();
2306
2307 // moved here from HandleCharEnumOpcode
2308 CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_EXPIRED_BANS);
2309 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2310 }
2311
2313 if (_timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].Passed())
2314 {
2315 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update who list"));
2316 _timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].Reset();
2317 sWhoListCacheMgr->Update();
2318 }
2319
2320 {
2321 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Check quest reset times"));
2322
2324 if (currentGameTime > _nextDailyQuestReset)
2325 {
2326 ResetDailyQuests();
2327 }
2328
2330 if (currentGameTime > _nextWeeklyQuestReset)
2331 {
2332 ResetWeeklyQuests();
2333 }
2334
2336 if (currentGameTime > _nextMonthlyQuestReset)
2337 {
2338 ResetMonthlyQuests();
2339 }
2340 }
2341
2342 if (currentGameTime > _nextRandomBGReset)
2343 {
2344 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset random BG"));
2345 ResetRandomBG();
2346 }
2347
2348 if (currentGameTime > _nextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime)
2349 {
2350 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Delete old calendar events"));
2351 CalendarDeleteOldEvents();
2352 }
2353
2354 if (currentGameTime > _nextGuildReset)
2355 {
2356 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset guild cap"));
2357 ResetGuildCap();
2358 }
2359
2360 {
2361 // pussywizard: handle expired auctions, auctions expired when realm was offline are also handled here (not during loading when many required things aren't loaded yet)
2362 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update expired auctions"));
2363 sAuctionMgr->Update(diff);
2364 }
2365
2366 if (currentGameTime > _mail_expire_check_timer)
2367 {
2368 sObjectMgr->ReturnOrDeleteOldMails(true);
2369 _mail_expire_check_timer = currentGameTime + 6h;
2370 }
2371
2372 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update sessions"));
2373 UpdateSessions(diff);
2374
2376 if (_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Passed())
2377 {
2378 _timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Reset();
2379 WeatherMgr::Update(uint32(_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].GetInterval()));
2380 }
2381
2383 if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME) > 0) // if not enabled, ignore the timer
2384 {
2385 if (_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Passed())
2386 {
2387 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Clean logs table"));
2388
2389 _timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
2390
2391 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_DEL_OLD_LOGS);
2392 stmt->SetData(0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME));
2393 stmt->SetData(1, uint32(currentGameTime.count()));
2394 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2395 }
2396 }
2397
2398 {
2399 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 0"));
2400 sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 0); // pussywizard: remove obsolete stuff before finding compatibility during map update
2401 }
2402
2403 {
2405 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update maps"));
2406 sMapMgr->Update(diff);
2407 }
2408
2409 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST))
2410 {
2411 if (_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Passed())
2412 {
2413 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Send autobroadcast"));
2414 _timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Reset();
2415 sAutobroadcastMgr->SendAutobroadcasts();
2416 }
2417 }
2418
2419 {
2420 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update battlegrounds"));
2421 sBattlegroundMgr->Update(diff);
2422 }
2423
2424 {
2425 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update outdoor pvp"));
2426 sOutdoorPvPMgr->Update(diff);
2427 }
2428
2429 {
2430 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update worldstate"));
2431 sWorldState->Update(diff);
2432 }
2433
2434 {
2435 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update battlefields"));
2436 sBattlefieldMgr->Update(diff);
2437 }
2438
2439 {
2440 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 2"));
2441 sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 2); // pussywizard: handle created proposals
2442 }
2443
2444 {
2445 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Process query callbacks"));
2446 // execute callbacks from sql queries that were queued recently
2447 ProcessQueryCallbacks();
2448 }
2449
2451 if (_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Passed())
2452 {
2453 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update uptime"));
2454
2455 _timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
2456
2457 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_UPTIME_PLAYERS);
2458 stmt->SetData(0, uint32(GameTime::GetUptime().count()));
2459 stmt->SetData(1, uint16(GetMaxPlayerCount()));
2460 stmt->SetData(2, realm.Id.Realm);
2461 stmt->SetData(3, uint32(GameTime::GetStartTime().count()));
2462 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2463 }
2464
2466 if (_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Passed())
2467 {
2468 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Remove old corpses"));
2469 _timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Reset();
2470
2471 sMapMgr->DoForAllMaps([](Map* map)
2472 {
2473 map->RemoveOldCorpses();
2474 });
2475 }
2476
2478 if (_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Passed())
2479 {
2480 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update game events"));
2481 _timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset(); // to give time for Update() to be processed
2482 uint32 nextGameEvent = sGameEventMgr->Update();
2483 _timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].SetInterval(nextGameEvent);
2484 _timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset();
2485 }
2486
2488 if (_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Passed())
2489 {
2490 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Ping MySQL"));
2491 _timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Reset();
2492 LOG_DEBUG("sql.driver", "Ping MySQL to keep connection alive");
2493 CharacterDatabase.KeepAlive();
2494 LoginDatabase.KeepAlive();
2495 WorldDatabase.KeepAlive();
2496 }
2497
2498 {
2499 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update instance reset times"));
2500 // update the instance reset times
2501 sInstanceSaveMgr->Update();
2502 }
2503
2504 {
2505 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Process cli commands"));
2506 // And last, but not least handle the issued cli commands
2507 ProcessCliCommands();
2508 }
2509
2510 {
2511 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update world scripts"));
2512 sScriptMgr->OnWorldUpdate(diff);
2513 }
2514
2515 {
2516 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update metrics"));
2517 // Stats logger update
2518 sMetric->Update();
2519 METRIC_VALUE("update_time_diff", diff);
2520 }
2521}

◆ UpdateSessions()

void World::UpdateSessions ( uint32  diff)
overridevirtual
  • Add new sessions
  • Then send an update signal to remaining ones
  • and remove not active sessions from the list

Implements IWorld.

2801{
2802 {
2803 METRIC_DETAILED_NO_THRESHOLD_TIMER("world_update_time",
2804 METRIC_TAG("type", "Add sessions"),
2805 METRIC_TAG("parent_type", "Update sessions"));
2806
2808 WorldSession* sess = nullptr;
2809 while (_addSessQueue.next(sess))
2810 {
2811 AddSession_(sess);
2812 }
2813 }
2814
2816 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = _sessions.begin(), next; itr != _sessions.end(); itr = next)
2817 {
2818 next = itr;
2819 ++next;
2820
2822 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2823 WorldSessionFilter updater(pSession);
2824
2825 // pussywizard:
2826 if (pSession->HandleSocketClosed())
2827 {
2828 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2829 _disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2830 _sessions.erase(itr);
2831 // there should be no offline session if current one is logged onto a character
2832 SessionMap::iterator iter;
2833 if ((iter = _offlineSessions.find(pSession->GetAccountId())) != _offlineSessions.end())
2834 {
2835 WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
2836 _offlineSessions.erase(iter);
2837 delete tmp;
2838 }
2839 pSession->SetOfflineTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
2840 _offlineSessions[pSession->GetAccountId()] = pSession;
2841 continue;
2842 }
2843
2844 [[maybe_unused]] uint32 currentSessionId = itr->first;
2845 METRIC_DETAILED_TIMER("world_update_sessions_time", METRIC_TAG("account_id", std::to_string(currentSessionId)));
2846
2847 if (!pSession->Update(diff, updater))
2848 {
2849 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2850 _disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2851 _sessions.erase(itr);
2852 delete pSession;
2853 }
2854 }
2855
2856 // pussywizard:
2857 if (_offlineSessions.empty())
2858 return;
2859 uint32 currTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2860 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = _offlineSessions.begin(), next; itr != _offlineSessions.end(); itr = next)
2861 {
2862 next = itr;
2863 ++next;
2864 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2865 if (!pSession->GetPlayer() || pSession->GetOfflineTime() + 60 < currTime || pSession->IsKicked())
2866 {
2867 _offlineSessions.erase(itr);
2868 delete pSession;
2869 }
2870 }
2871}
